segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) supports a number of different deployment configurations.
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) supports a number of different deployment configurations.

segment.source: This section of the Administrator’s Guide for Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring includes information that you should consider about the deployment of MBAM and step-by-step procedures to help you successfully perform the tasks that you must complete at different stages of your deployment.
segment.target: This section of the Administrator’s Guide for Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring includes information that you should consider about the deployment of MBAM and step-by-step procedures to help you successfully perform the tasks that you must complete at different stages of your deployment.

segment.source: This section describes the different topology options for MBAM deployment and how to use MBAM Setup to deploy MBAM Server features.
segment.target: This section describes the different topology options for MBAM deployment and how to use MBAM Setup to deploy MBAM Server features.

segment.source: This section describes how to create and deploy the MBAM Group Policy Objects that are required to manage MBAM Clients and BitLocker encryption policies throughout the enterprise.
segment.target: This section describes how to create and deploy the MBAM Group Policy Objects that are required to manage MBAM Clients and BitLocker encryption policies throughout the enterprise.

segment.source: This section describes how to use the MBAM Client Windows Installer files to deploy the MBAM Client software.
segment.target: This section describes how to use the MBAM Client Windows Installer files to deploy the MBAM Client software.

segment.source: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Language Release Update
segment.target: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Language Release Update

segment.source: This section describes how to deploy the MBAM language release update to provide support for additional non-English language user interfaces.
segment.target: This section describes how to deploy the MBAM language release update to provide support for additional non-English language user interfaces.

segment.source: This section provides a deployment checklist that can help you deploy MBAM Server and MBAM Client.
segment.target: This section provides a deployment checklist that can help you deploy MBAM Server and MBAM Client.

segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring 1 Administrator's Guide
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring 1 Administrator's Guide
